summary: Frontend testing for Batch 10 'Zero Loaders' performance refactoring - verified profile/edit.tsx, profile/notifications.tsx, and checkout/success.tsx. FIXED: 1 bug - undefined fetchData function reference in notifications page. All pages load instantly without generic ActivityIndicator spinners.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed profile/notifications.tsx: fetchData was referenced on line 148 but not defined - changed to onRefresh which is the correct function
Cache-first pattern correctly implemented using useCacheFirst hook in profile/edit and profile/notifications pages
checkout/success.tsx correctly uses Ionicons 'shield-checkmark-outline' instead of ActivityIndicator for branded verification state
All refactored pages have RefreshControl for pull-to-refresh functionality
localStorage quota error observed for @cache_home_listings - not blocking but worth monitoring for large listing sets

bug_fixes.issue: Undefined fetchData function referenced on line 148 (handleUnsubscribeAll function)
bug_fixes.fix: Changed fetchData() to onRefresh() which is the correct function defined in the component

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 187 verified Batch 10 of 'Zero Loaders' performance refactoring: /profile/edit, /profile/notifications, /checkout/success. Fixed 1 bug - undefined fetchData reference in notifications page (changed to onRefresh). All pages render instantly without generic ActivityIndicator spinners. Previous batch pages (/credits, /business/[slug]) still working. Cache-first pattern is correctly implemented across all pages.
